name: Cube Cat Adventure!
description:
One day this cat mysteriously found himself on an island, and this is where his fantastic adventure began, will the cat manage to return home? Who is this cat? Who is his master? Why did he wake up on this island?
Try It and Enjoy!

The game inputs available are: PC Keyboard

WASD to move
SPACE to jump
Mouse to look around or arrows

This is a prototype game made in Unreal and c++
The characters were made with Voxel
